name: Mare (Spooky 2D Jam 2022)
description:
CONTROLS:

Move - WASD / Arrow Keys

Lantern - SPACE

Sprint - SHIFT


A game inspired by the story of "Bäckahästen" from nordic folklore. You are lost in the woods, carrying only your lantern. Find your way out, but beware of the creatures you may encounter - not all are friendly.

Some polishing needed, but it's all made from scratch for the Spooky 2D Jam 2022!

Thank you for playing, we hope you enjoy it!
